title: Scrub Field
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. The grasses range in height from less than a meter to nearly two meters tall in places. Wildflowers grow among the grasses. Lush, green grasses wave gently in the wind. The land is gently sloped down to the north, gently sloped up to the east, gently sloped up to the south, gently sloped up to the west.
